verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--"śrīkānta āsiyāche pāñā mano-duḥkha
kichu nā baliha, karuka, yāte ihāra sukha"

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; śrīkānta—Śrīkānta; āsiyāche—has come; pāñā—getting; manaḥ-duḥkha—distress in the mind; kichu—anything; nā baliha—do not say; karuka—let him do; yāte—by which; ihāra—his; sukha—happiness.
translation: As Govinda was warning Śrīkānta, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said, "Don't bother him. Let Śrīkānta do whatever he likes, for he has come here in a distressed state of mind."
